content:
### Bug fixes

* [Bitwarden:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.bitwarden.md) Fixed an issue with the Update operation of the Group resource
* [Cortex:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.cortex.md) Fixed an issue where only the last item got returned
* [Invoice Ninja:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.invoiceninja.md) Fixed an issue with the Project parameter
* [Salesforce:](/integrations/builtin/app-nodes/n8n-nodes-base.salesforce.md) Fixed an issue with the Get All operation of the Custom Object resource
